text: Artist Of The Month June 2025 CRYPTOPSY Is Metal Injection's Artist Of The Month for June 2025! Photo by Maciej Pieloch We are excited to keep our Artist Of The Month series going by honoring the legends of pulverizing death metal, Cryptopsy! For nearly four decades Cryptopsy has been pummeling us with their sick and twisted grooves only the sickest of creatures can love, and we're more than happy to be among that group. The band is back to do it all over again with their latest efforts An Insatiable Violence, coming at you June 20 via Season of Mist! Join us as we celebrate Cryptopsy all month long and their forthcoming album, with a slew of exclusive content and editorials, only at Metal Injection! Want More Metal? html:
Artist Of The Month June 2025

CRYPTOPSY Is Metal Injection's Artist Of The Month for June 2025!

Photo by Maciej Pieloch

We are excited to keep our Artist Of The Month series going by honoring the legends of pulverizing death metal, Cryptopsy!

For nearly four decades Cryptopsy has been pummeling us with their sick and twisted grooves only the sickest of creatures can love, and we're more than happy to be among that group. The band is back to do it all over again with their latest efforts An Insatiable Violence, coming at you June 20 via Season of Mist!

Join us as we celebrate Cryptopsy all month long and their forthcoming album, with a slew of exclusive content and editorials, only at Metal Injection!
